I was quite surprised after installing this game considering its size to see just how good it looks, and plays ( apart from one time after sideswiping another truck my truck tookoff into space, and then the bank sold it lmao )

gets kind of boring after awhile though, but driving itself is amazing, especially at night.

used a memory editor to get some cash and experience, got to level 137 lmao... and that's not the limit

for anyone wondering the cheat program i used is ( ArtMoney SE v7.39 )

best way to use it is, search for custom ( Interger 4 bytes ) uncheck everything else, editing the cash is fairly easy, just do a search for the exact amount.. make sure you at the menu where the map/bank/trader and such is in the ESC menu, assuming you dont have a common amount of money like 100,10000 etc.. it should only find a few address and just edit 1 by 1 adding a single dollar then check ingame to see if it took hold (will need to change screens to refresh it)

for experience, search for the exact value, say your 1,248/2,000. you would search for 1248, you will most likely get heaps of entries.. just leave everything as it is... go drive a single short mission to gain some experience, then in artmoney, click filter and look for the new value.. if your lucky should only be 1 or 2, then add a million or so xp to the value and watch your level climb to a 100+ if you wanna get crazy.

For those of you who are already playing and It still asks for Activation I found a work around that is working for me.

1. Block game .exe with a good Firewall or just disable the whole internet as I did.
2. Uncheck "Online News" in-game going to "Options > Gameplay".
3. Now close the game and go to "My Documents > Euro Truck Simulator 2" and open "config.cfg" with Notepad.
4. Look for the following line in config.cfg >>> uset g_sns "(junk here)" > uset g_sns ""

For those of you who are already playing and It still asks for Activation I found a work around that is working for me.

1. Block game .exe with a good Firewall or just disable the whole internet as I did.
2. Uncheck "Online News" in-game going to "Options > Gameplay".
3. Now close the game and go to "My Documents > Euro Truck Simulator 2" and open "config.cfg" with Notepad.
4. Look for the following line in config.cfg >> uset g_sns "(junk here)"
5. Remove everything there is between the quotation marks, It should look like this >> uset g_sns ""
6. Save the file and open the game back again It should ask for a new key.
7. Type in a key you havent used yet like "7KWDE-K9MV0-KFM10-ACJ2Q-HY9KZ".
8. Profit!

Actually I got it fixed. Here's what I did - 

1) Reinstall the game.

2) At the very beginning it asks you for serial, type the given serial.

3) Go to Options > Gameplay > uncheck the "Online News" option. 

4) Go to Documents > Euro Truck Simulator 2 > There will be a file called "live_streams.sii" Delete it.

5) ???

6) Profit!

If you have trouble with patch 1.1.3. follow my steps:
1. Uninstall the game
2. Go to documents, FIND the folder "euro truck simulator 2", DELETE the Whole folder (if you want your alredy made profile go in the folder euro truck simulator/profile and put the folder to your desktop and then delete folder "euro truck simulator 2")
3. Clean your registry, I'm using "Wise registry cleaner", it's free, just google it.
4. After cleaning the registry, disable your internet
5. Install the game
6. Start the game, put the key from this torrent
7. NEVER AGAIN UPDATE THE GAME!!!!
8. Allways turn your internet off before starting
9. PROFIT :D

This solution worked for me (thanks Xerak from Skidrow-games):

1. Go to documents/ETS2/config.cfg —> uset g_sns “x”
2. Change x to any cd key
3. Change config.cfg to “read-only” (right-click, properties)
4. Play the game
5. You have to enter the CD-key every time you start the game, but it let's you activate it, and it works to play

I tried this with a profile that had reached the end of the trial-period ("Activate game" pops up after a certain time of playing). Of course you can't do any configurations as long as the file is read-only, disable temporarily if you want to make any graphics changes, but change back since the file is checked/altered every time the game starts.

You all say "block eurotrucksimulator2.exe with a good firewall"..Sorry if i look silly to you,but how can i do that? I use Microsoft Security Essentials.

Go to Control Panel, >System and SecurityWindows FirewallAdvanced SettingsOutbound RulesNew Rule...<
Check >ProgramThis program path< write where your game is, example: "E:GamesEuro Truck Simulator 2binwin_x86eurotrucks2.exe"
Click Next, Check >Block the Connection
Click Next, Check All, Next again, write something like Block ETS2, Click Finish
